verses.verse: וְאִשָּׁ֣ה <WH802> wə·’iš·šāh ... אַחַ֣ת <WH259> ’a·ḥaṯ of one ( The Widow’s Oil) מִנְּשֵׁ֣י <WH802> min·nə·šê Now the wife בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ḇə·nê- of the sons הַ֠נְּבִיאִים <WH5030> han·nə·ḇî·’îm of the prophets צָעֲקָ֨ה <WH6817> ṣā·‘ă·qāh cried out אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- to אֱלִישָׁ֜ע <WH477> ’ĕ·lî·šā‘ Elisha לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> lê·mōr ..., עַבְדְּךָ֤ <WH5650> ‘aḇ·də·ḵā “ Your servant, אִישִׁי֙ <WH376> ’î·šî my husband, מֵ֔ת <WH4191> mêṯ is dead, וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> wə·’at·tāh and you יָדַ֔עְתָּ <WH3045> yā·ḏa‘·tā know כִּ֣י <WH3588> kî that עַבְדְּךָ֔ <WH5650> ‘aḇ·də·ḵā your servant הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> hā·yāh יָרֵ֖א <WH3373> yā·rê feared אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD. וְהַ֨נֹּשֶׁ֔ה <WH5383> wə·han·nō·šeh And now his creditor בָּ֗א <WH935> bā is coming לָקַ֜חַת <WH3947> lā·qa·ḥaṯ to take אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - שְׁנֵ֧י <WH8147> šə·nê my two יְלָדַ֛י <WH3206> yə·lā·ḏay children ל֖וֹ Prep│3ms ( lōw) as his לַעֲבָדִֽים׃ 5650 Prep-l│N-mp ( la·‘ă·ḇā·ḏîm) slaves! ”

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer asked אֵלֶ֤יהָ <WH413> ’ê·le·hā .... אֱלִישָׁע֙ <WH477> ’ĕ·lî·šā‘ Elisha מָ֣ה <WH4100> māh “ How אֶֽעֱשֶׂה־ <WH6213> ’e·‘ĕ·śeh- can I לָּ֔ךְ Prep│2fs ( lāḵ) help you? ” הַגִּ֣ידִי 5046 V-Hifil-Imp-fs ( hag·gî·ḏî) “ Tell לִ֔י Prep│1cs ( lî) me, מַה־ 4100 Interrog ( mah-) what יֶּשׁ־ 3426 Adv ( yeš-) do you have לְכִי Prep│2fs ( lə·ḵī) ... בַּבָּ֑יִת 1004 Prep-b, Art│N-ms ( bab·bā·yiṯ) in the house? ” וַתֹּ֗אמֶר 559 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConsecImperf-3fs ( wat·tō·mer) She answered, אֵ֣ין 369 Adv ( ’ên) has nothing לְשִׁפְחָתְךָ֥ 8198 Prep-l│N-fsc│2ms ( lə·šip̄·ḥā·ṯə·ḵā) “ Your servant כֹל֙ 3605 N-ms ( ḵōl) ... בַּבַּ֔יִת 1004 Prep-b, Art│N-ms ( bab·ba·yiṯ) in the house כִּ֖י 3588 Conj ( kî) vvv אִם־ 518 Conj ( ’im-) but אָס֥וּךְ 610 N-msc ( ’ā·sūḵ) a jar שָֽׁמֶן׃ 8081 N-ms ( šā·men) of oil. ”

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer said [Elisha], לְכִ֨י <WH1980> lə·ḵî “ Go, ” שַׁאֲלִי־ <WH7592> ša·’ă·lî- “ borrow לָ֤ךְ Prep│2fs ( lāḵ) כֵּלִים֙ 3627 N-mp ( kê·lîm) jars, מִן־ 4480 Prep ( min-) from הַח֔וּץ 2351 Art│N-ms ( ha·ḥūṣ) vvv מֵאֵ֖ת 854 Prep-m│DirObjM ( mê·’êṯ) vvv כָּל־ 3605 N-msc ( kāl-) all שִׁכְנָכֵי 7934 N-mpc│2fs ( šiḵ·nå̄·ḵē) your neighbors. כֵּלִ֥ים 3627 N-mp ( kê·lîm) ones, רֵקִ֖ים 7386 Adj-mp ( rê·qîm) [even] empty אַל־ 408 Adv ( ’al-) Do not תַּמְעִֽיטִי׃ 4591 V-Hifil-Imperf-2fs ( tam·‘î·ṭî) gather just a few.

וּבָ֗את <WH935> ū·ḇāṯ Then go inside, וְסָגַ֤רְתְּ <WH5462> wə·sā·ḡart shut הַדֶּ֙לֶת֙ <WH1817> had·de·leṯ the door בַּעֲדֵ֣ךְ <WH1157> ba·‘ă·ḏêḵ behind you וּבְעַד־ <WH1157> ū·ḇə·‘aḏ- and בָּנַ֔יִךְ <WH1121> bā·na·yiḵ your sons, וְיָצַ֕קְתְּ <WH3332> wə·yā·ṣaqt and pour עַ֥ל <WH5921> ‘al oil into כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- all הַכֵּלִ֖ים <WH3627> hak·kê·lîm jars, הָאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> hā·’êl·leh these וְהַמָּלֵ֖א <WH4392> wə·ham·mā·lê setting the full ones תַּסִּֽיעִי׃ <WH5265> tas·sî·‘î aside. ”

וַתֵּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH1980> wat·tê·leḵ So she left מֵֽאִתּ֔וֹ <WH854> mê·’it·tōw him, וַתִּסְגֹּ֣ר <WH5462> wat·tis·gōr and after she had shut הַדֶּ֔לֶת <WH1817> had·de·leṯ the door בַּעֲדָ֖הּ <WH1157> ba·‘ă·ḏāh behind her וּבְעַ֣ד <WH1157> ū·ḇə·‘aḏ and בָּנֶ֑יהָ <WH1121> bā·ne·hā her sons, הֵ֛ם <WH1992> hêm they מַגִּשִׁ֥ים <WH5066> mag·gi·šîm kept bringing [jars] אֵלֶ֖יהָ <WH413> ’ê·le·hā to her, וְהִ֥יא <WH1931> wə·hî and she מֵיצָקֶת׃ <WH3332> mē·ṣå̄·qɛṯ kept pouring.

וַיְהִ֣י׀ <WH1961> way·hî When כִּמְלֹ֣את <WH4390> kim·lōṯ were full, הַכֵּלִ֗ים <WH3627> hak·kê·lîm all the jars וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> wat·tō·mer she said אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- to בְּנָהּ֙ <WH1121> bə·nāh her son, הַגִּ֨ישָׁה <WH5066> hag·gî·šāh “ Bring me אֵלַ֥י <WH413> ’ê·lay ... עוֹד֙ <WH5750> ‘ō·wḏ another כֶּ֔לִי <WH3627> ke·lî .... ” וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer But he replied, אֵלֶ֔יהָ <WH413> ’ê·le·hā ... אֵ֥ין <WH369> ’ên “ There are no ע֖וֹד <WH5750> ‘ō·wḏ more כֶּ֑לִי <WH3627> ke·lî jars. ” וַֽיַּעֲמֹ֖ד <WH5975> way·ya·‘ă·mōḏ stopped flowing. הַשָּֽׁמֶן׃ <WH8081> haš·šā·men Then the oil

וַתָּבֹ֗א <WH935> wat·tā·ḇō She went וַתַּגֵּד֙ <WH5046> wat·tag·gêḏ and told לְאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> lə·’îš the man הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> hā·’ĕ·lō·hîm of God, וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer and he said, לְכִי֙ <WH1980> lə·ḵî “ Go, מִכְרִ֣י <WH4376> miḵ·rî sell אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - הַשֶּׁ֔מֶן <WH8081> haš·še·men the oil, וְשַׁלְּמִ֖י <WH7999> wə·šal·lə·mî and pay אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - נִשְׁיֵכִי <WH5386> niš·yē·ḵī your debt. וְאַ֣תְּ <WH859> wə·’at Then you בְּנֵיכִי <WH1121> bə·nē·ḵī and your sons תִֽחְיִ֖י <WH2421> ṯiḥ·yî can live בַּנּוֹתָֽר׃פ <WH3498> ban·nō·w·ṯār on the remainder. ”

( The Shunammite Woman) ( 470 10:40-42 ) וַיְהִ֨י <WH1961> way·hî - הַיּ֜וֹם <WH3117> hay·yō·wm One day וַיַּעֲבֹ֧ר <WH5674> way·ya·‘ă·ḇōr went אֱלִישָׁ֣ע <WH477> ’ĕ·lî·šā‘ Elisha אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- to שׁוּנֵ֗ם <WH7766> šū·nêm Shunem, וְשָׁם֙ <WH8033> wə·šām who lived there אִשָּׁ֣ה <WH802> ’iš·šāh woman גְדוֹלָ֔ה <WH1419> ḡə·ḏō·w·lāh and a prominent וַתַּחֲזֶק־ <WH2388> wat·ta·ḥă·zeq- persuaded בּ֖וֹ Prep│3ms ( bōw) him לֶאֱכָל־ 398 Prep-l│V-Qal-Inf ( le·’ĕ·ḵāl-) to have a meal לָ֑חֶם 3899 N-ms ( lā·ḥem) .... וַֽיְהִי֙ 1961 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConsecImperf-3ms ( way·hî) So whenever מִדֵּ֣י 1767 Prep-m│N-msc ( mid·dê) ... עָבְר֔וֹ 5674 V-Qal-Inf│3ms ( ‘ā·ḇə·rōw) he would pass by, יָסֻ֥ר 5493 V-Qal-Imperf-3ms ( yā·sur) he would stop שָׁ֖מָּה 8033 Adv│3fs ( šām·māh) there לֶאֱכָל־ 398 Prep-l│V-Qal-Inf ( le·’ĕ·ḵāl-) to eat לָֽחֶם׃ 3899 N-ms ( lā·ḥem) ....

וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> wat·tō·mer Then [the woman] said אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- to אִישָׁ֔הּ <WH376> ’î·šāh her husband, הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> hin·nêh- “ Behold, נָ֣א <WH4994> nā now יָדַ֔עְתִּי <WH3045> yā·ḏa‘·tî I know כִּ֛י <WH3588> kî that אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> ’îš man אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hîm of God. קָד֣וֹשׁ <WH6918> qā·ḏō·wōš is a holy ה֑וּא <WH1931> hū the one עֹבֵ֥ר <WH5674> ‘ō·ḇêr comes our way עָלֵ֖ינוּ <WH5921> ‘ā·lê·nū ... תָּמִֽיד׃ <WH8548> tā·mîḏ who often

נַֽעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> na·‘ă·śeh- let us make נָּ֤א <WH4994> nā Please עֲלִיַּת־ <WH5944> ‘ă·lî·yaṯ- room upstairs קִיר֙ <WH7023> qîr ... קְטַנָּ֔ה <WH6996> qə·ṭan·nāh a small וְנָשִׂ֨ים <WH7760> wə·nā·śîm and put ל֥וֹ Prep│3ms ( lōw) for him. שָׁ֛ם 8033 Adv ( šām) in it מִטָּ֥ה 4296 N-fs ( miṭ·ṭāh) a bed, וְשֻׁלְחָ֖ן 7979 Conj-w│N-ms ( wə·šul·ḥān) a table, וְכִסֵּ֣א 3678 Conj-w│N-ms ( wə·ḵis·sê) a chair, וּמְנוֹרָ֑ה 4501 Conj-w│N-fs ( ū·mə·nō·w·rāh) and a lamp וְהָיָ֛ה 1961 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConjPerf-3ms ( wə·hā·yāh) Then when בְּבֹא֥וֹ 935 Prep-b│V-Qal-Inf│3ms ( bə·ḇō·’ōw) he comes אֵלֵ֖ינוּ 413 Prep│1cp ( ’ê·lê·nū) to us, יָס֥וּר 5493 V-Qal-Imperf-3ms ( yā·sūr) he can stay שָֽׁמָּה׃ 8033 Adv│3fs ( šām·māh) there. ”

וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> way·hî - הַיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> hay·yō·wm One day וַיָּ֣בֹא <WH935> way·yā·ḇō [Elisha] came to visit שָׁ֑מָּה <WH8033> šām·māh ... וַיָּ֥סַר <WH5493> way·yā·sar and went אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- to הָעֲלִיָּ֖ה <WH5944> hā·‘ă·lî·yāh his upper room וַיִּשְׁכַּב־ <WH7901> way·yiš·kaḇ- to lie down שָֽׁמָּה׃ <WH8033> šām·māh ....

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> way·yō·mer And he said אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- to גֵּחֲזִ֣י <WH1522> gê·ḥă·zî Gehazi נַעֲר֔וֹ <WH5288> na·‘ă·rōw his servant, קְרָ֖א <WH7121> qə·rā “ Call לַשּׁוּנַמִּ֣ית <WH7767> laš·šū·nam·mîṯ Shunammite woman. ” הַזֹּ֑את <WH2063> haz·zōṯ the וַיִּקְרָא־ <WH7121> way·yiq·rā- And when he had called לָ֔הּ Prep│3fs ( lāh) her, וַֽתַּעֲמֹ֖ד 5975 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConsecImperf-3fs ( wat·ta·‘ă·mōḏ) she stood לְפָנָֽיו׃ 6440 Prep-l│N-cpc│3ms ( lə·p̄ā·nāw) before him,

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer and [Elisha] said ל֗וֹ Prep│3ms ( lōw) to Gehazi, אֱמָר־ 559 V-Qal-Imp-ms ( ’ĕ·mār-) tell נָ֣א 4994 Interjection ( nā) “ Now אֵלֶיהָ֮ 413 Prep│3fs ( ’ê·le·hā) her, הִנֵּ֣ה 2009 Interjection ( hin·nêh) ‘ Look, חָרַ֣דְתְּ׀ 2729 V-Qal-Perf-2fs ( ḥā·raḏt) trouble אֵלֵינוּ֮ 413 Prep│1cp ( ’ê·lê·nū) for us. אֶת־ 853 Prep ( ’eṯ-) - כָּל־ 3605 N-msc ( kāl-) you have gone to all הַחֲרָדָ֣ה 2731 Art│N-fs ( ha·ḥă·rā·ḏāh) ... הַזֹּאת֒ 2063 Art│Pro-fs ( haz·zōṯ) this מֶ֚ה 4100 Interrog ( meh) What לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת 6213 Prep-l│V-Qal-Inf ( la·‘ă·śō·wṯ) can we do לָ֔ךְ Prep│2fs ( lāḵ) for you? הֲיֵ֤שׁ 3426 Adv ( hă·yêš) ... לְדַבֶּר־ 1696 Prep-l│V-Piel-Inf ( lə·ḏab·ber-) Can we speak לָךְ֙ Prep│2fs ( lāḵ) אֶל־ 413 Prep ( ’el-) on your behalf to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ 4428 Art│N-ms ( ham·me·leḵ) the king א֖וֹ 176 Conj ( ’ōw) or אֶל־ 413 Prep ( ’el-) - שַׂ֣ר 8269 N-msc ( śar) the commander הַצָּבָ֑א 6635 Art│N-cs ( haṣ·ṣā·ḇā) of the army? ’” וַתֹּ֕אמֶר 559 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConsecImperf-3fs ( wat·tō·mer) she replied. בְּת֥וֹךְ 8432 Prep-b│N-msc ( bə·ṯō·wḵ) among עַמִּ֖י 5971 N-msc│1cs ( ‘am·mî) my own people, ” אָנֹכִ֥י 595 Pro-1cs ( ’ā·nō·ḵî) “ I יֹשָֽׁבֶת׃ 3427 V-Qal-Prtcpl-fs ( yō·šā·ḇeṯ) have a home

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer So he asked, וּמֶ֖ה <WH4100> ū·meh “ Then what לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> la·‘ă·śō·wṯ should be done לָ֑הּ Prep│3fs ( lāh) for her? ” וַיֹּ֣אמֶר 559 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConsecImperf-3ms ( way·yō·mer) replied, גֵּיחֲזִ֗י 1522 N-proper-ms ( gê·ḥă·zî) Gehazi אֲבָ֛ל 61 Adv ( ’ă·ḇāl) “ Well, בֵּ֥ן 1121 N-ms ( bên) son, ” אֵֽין־ 369 Adv ( ’ên-) no לָ֖הּ Prep│3fs ( lāh) she has וְאִישָׁ֥הּ 376 Conj-w│N-msc│3fs ( wə·’î·šāh) “ and her husband זָקֵֽן׃ 2204 V-Qal-Perf-3ms ( zā·qên) is old. ”
